text: General Grievous is a fictional character and a villain in the Star Wars series. He is a Kaleesh turned cyborg who served for the CIS during the Clone Wars. ==Portrayals== Grievous was first voiced by John DiMaggio and Richard MacGonagle in Star Wars: Clone Wars before Matthew Wood took over starting with Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2004 Category:Fictional war veterans Category:Star Wars characters
title: General Grievous
